title: Tech News: Fake Reviews, Fake Products and Fake Currency
itunes:title: Tech News: Fake Reviews, Fake Products and Fake Currency
description:
Hackers shut down Colonial Pipeline in the largest cyberattack on US infrastructure to date. Amazon responds to calls to crack down on counterfeiting. And a casual comment from Elon Musk causes the value of dogecoin to plummet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
